Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_n6ewzjjMuN1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/76708e9e046c133f57f17c3e37467266/tumblr_inline_n6ewztjUDF1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>Harkening back to the days when every game company had a mascot, <a href="https://twitter.com/mike_gaboury"><strong>@mike_gaboury</strong></a> made this cool compilation of the most recognizable indie game characters on the scene today. Can you find Jeb?</p>
I found him. It was harder than I expected, though.
Found him as well. Took some looking, but there he is!
2 seconds. Yeah, I'm good at this kind of thing.
Why is he looking at the sword like that?
Hes actually looking at the helmet and wonders if he can make a rocket out of it.

A bit slower, I tried looking on the top first.

Is that the Avian from Starbound on the top right?

Found him..

It looks like he's looking at the castle crashers knight.
Found him in just five seconds. That was easier than I thought! It was pure luck, of course.

2 seconds. Yeah, I'm good at this kind of thing.

Yup, same here reconized him in seconds.

Found him. Love the references to Shovel Knight, Super Meat Boy, Battleblock Theater, Octodad, Hotline Miami, Magika, Goat Simulator, Journey, Castle Crashers, Binding of Isaac, Don't Starve, Fez, Starwhals: Just the Tip, and every other reference to great steam games.
